text: Olivia Theresa Longott (born 15 February 1981) is an American singer, songwriter and television personality. [ Artist Chart History]. Billboard. Retrieved September 24, 2007. She was also on the Love & Hip Hop: New York series. She is best known for singing on rapper 50 Cent's song "Candy Shop". == Early life and career== Longott was born in Brooklyn, New York. She was raised in New York City. She studied music at Bayside High School. She started her career in her teenage years. She released her first single in 2000. == Discography == * Olivia (2001) == Notes == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Brooklyn Category:Singers from New York City Category:American R&B; singers Category:American hip hop singers Category:American soul singers Category:Rappers
title: Olivia (singer)
